name: WooNoComments
author: Manuel Flores

sections.description:
Suppresses feedback products in WooCommerce, no need to change anything this plugin makes itself.

Elimina los comentarios en los productos de la tienda Woocommerce, usted no necesita cambiar nada de manera manual, el plugin lo hace solo.

Compatibility

Requires WordPress 4.1 or higher.

GitHub

https://github.com/mdfnet/woonocomment
sections.installation:
1. Go to Plugins â€º Add New.
  2. Search for woonocomment.
  3. Look for this plugin, download and activate it.

short_description: Suppresses feedback products in WooCommerce. Needs WooCommerce to work. WooCommerce 2.6.x compatible.
